abstract: Increases on the broadband side and decreases on the television side are again evident in the cable company’s financial results.
snippet: Increases on the broadband side and decreases on the television side are again evident in the cable company’s financial results.
lead_paragraph: Comcast, the nation’s largest cable provider, told a familiar story through its third-quarter earnings on Wednesday: overall growth despite continued slippage in television subscribers, and unflattering comparisons to last year.

headline.main: Internet Subscribers Aid Growth by Comcast
headline.print_headline: Internet Subscribers Aid Growth By Comcast
